articles.title: Obese children who recently lost weight more likely to show hunger-related brain activity after a meal - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: Children with obesity, who have recently lost weight, are more likely to show hunger-related activity in their brains after a meal, according to research presented today at the 60th Annual European Society for Paediatric Endocrinology Meeting.
